languages.text: Лорный барк 6 (красные трубы с прометиумом — огнеопасно)

traits.locale_text: Лорный барк 6 (красные трубы с прометиумом — огнеопасно)

languages.text: Неизвестное ксеноустройство опутано проводами и несет следы грубого вмешательства. Кто-то пытался соединить его с человеческими технологиями.
The unknown xenodevice is covered in tangled wires and shows signs of crude tampering. Someone has attempted to incorporate it with human technology.
languages.original_text: Неизвестное ксеноустройство опутано проводами и несет следы грубого вмешательства. Кто-то пытался соединить его с человеческими технологиями.

traits.locale_text: The unknown xenodevice is covered in wires and bears signs of crude tampering. Someone has attempted to incorporate it with human technology.
The unknown xenodevice is covered in wires and bears signs of crude tampering. Someone has attempted to incorporate it with human technology.
The unknown xenodevice is covered in tangled wires and shows signs of crude tampering. Someone has attempted to incorporate it with human technology.
The unknown xenodevice is covered in tangled wires and shows signs of crude tampering. Someone has attempted to incorporate it with human technology.
The unknown xenodevice is covered in tangled wires and shows signs of crude tampering. Someone has attempted to incorporate it with human technology.
The unknown xenodevice is covered in tangled wires and shows signs of crude tampering. Someone has attempted to incorporate it with human technology.

languages.text: Das unbekannte Xenogerät ist mit einem Gewirr von Drähten bedeckt und zeigt Spuren einer unbeholfenen Manipulation. Jemand hat versucht, es mit menschlicher Technologie zu bedienen.
languages.original_text: The unknown xenodevice is covered in tangled wires and shows signs of crude tampering. Someone has attempted to incorporate it with human technology.

traits.locale_text: Das unbekannte Xenogerät ist mit einem Gewirr von Drähten bedeckt und zeigt Spuren einer unbeholfenen Manipulation. Jemand hat versucht, es mit menschlicher Technologie zu bedienen.

languages.text: D'innombrables fils emmêlés sont branchés sur l'appareil xénos inconnu qui présente également des signes d'altérations grossières. Quelqu'un a tenté de l'incorporer à une technologie d'origine humaine.
languages.original_text: The unknown xenodevice is covered in tangled wires and shows signs of crude tampering. Someone has attempted to incorporate it with human technology.

traits.locale_text: D'innombrables fils emmêlés sont branchés sur l'appareil xénos inconnu qui présente également des signes d'altérations grossières. Quelqu'un a tenté de l'incorporer à une technologie d'origine humaine.

languages.text: El misterioso xenodispositivo está cubierto por una maraña de cables y muestra signos de haber sido manipulado con torpeza. Alguien ha intentado combinarlo con tecnología humana.
languages.original_text: The unknown xenodevice is covered in tangled wires and shows signs of crude tampering. Someone has attempted to incorporate it with human technology.

traits.locale_text: El misterioso xenodispositivo está cubierto por una maraña de cables y muestra signos de haber sido manipulado con torpeza. Alguien ha intentado combinarlo con tecnología humana.

languages.text: 这台未知的异形装置电缆密布，还带有粗糙篡改的迹象。看起来，某个人打算把它与人类装置组合起来。
languages.original_text: The unknown xenodevice is covered in tangled wires and shows signs of crude tampering. Someone has attempted to incorporate it with human technology.

traits.locale_text: 这台未知的异形装置电缆密布，还带有粗糙篡改的迹象。看起来，某个人打算把它与人类装置组合起来。

languages.text: 正体不明のゼノデバイスは、絡み合った配線に覆われており、雑な改造の痕跡が見られる。何者かが人類のテクノロジーと組み合わせようとした形跡がある。
languages.original_text: The unknown xenodevice is covered in tangled wires and shows signs of crude tampering. Someone has attempted to incorporate it with human technology.

traits.locale_text: 正体不明のゼノデバイスは、絡み合った配線に覆われており、雑な改造の痕跡が見られる。何者かが人類のテクノロジーと組み合わせようとした形跡がある。

languages.text: Tanımlanamayan bir zeno cihazı, karmakarışık olmuş kablolarla kaplanmış. Cihazın üzerindeki izlere bakılırsa kabaca kurcalanmış. Birisi bu cihazı insan teknolojisiyle birleştirmeye çalışmış.
languages.original_text: The unknown xenodevice is covered in tangled wires and shows signs of crude tampering. Someone has attempted to incorporate it with human technology.

traits.locale_text: Tanımlanamayan bir zeno cihazı, karmakarışık olmuş kablolarla kaplanmış. Cihazın üzerindeki izlere bakılırsa kabaca kurcalanmış. Birisi bu cihazı insan teknolojisiyle birleştirmeye çalışmış.
